divs: Sighting Details Returning from a trip from New York City in my car to Waterloo NY at about 3 AM as I turned north on my home street, Carlton Road ,I was shocked to see a high intensity white light flight ignite and move horizontally with unbelievable acceleration.I queried Rome Air Development Center the next morning if they may have been testing phosphorous missiles in horizontal flight near Waterloo NY receiving a negative reply. The flash occured at about 10 degrees above the horizon at an estimated range of 1 to 10 miles. A tremendous amount of high frequency energy would be required for such acceleration if a significant amount of mass was involved..
trends: There have been no other sightings in Waterloo
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: blinding flash then horizontal flight of extremely bright ball of white light moving with unbelievable acceleration.
